branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, REB, Magnetically Coupled, Sine, Accelerating & Decelaration
branchCategory.description: <p>The REB, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates smoothly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 600 mm/sec.</p>
